Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to providing residents of municipal public housing in the state with free basic cable and high-speed internet service
Summary: Relates to providing residents of municipal public housing in the state with free basic cable and high-speed internet service, and reimbursing internet service providers and cable television companies for providing such service.
LawCode: Add ยง231, amd Art 11 Art Head, ยง212, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to providing free high-speed internet and cable service to residents of municipal housing authorities
